name: Apple Catch (BEA)
description:
A simple game I made together with ademonsart for our Media Computation (animation with Javascript) final project. 

RULES:

Click the "START" button on the startup screen to play the game. Use the mouse to move the basket. Catch all of the apples that fall from the top of the screen to win the game. If even just one apple reaches the ground, the game is lost. Play the game again by clicking the "REPLAY" button on the winning/losing screen.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
  • download one of the versions below
  • uncompress the zip file
  • open the file "applesgame"
  • if the game fails to open, check your system preferences
